title: "You Have Left A Game In Progress"
body:
I played a ranked game and won as Fizz. After I click skip waiting for stats due to boredom it asks me to reset my client. I then relog to see this http://imgur.com/a/ZwTsr  It then proceeds to continually crash if i reconnect I repeat relogging and reconnecting but it has yet to work.
It still like this what should I do. I also checked http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Kazemetsu to see if the game was at least there to see but it wasnt.
I finished the game about 30-50 minutes ago.

replies.body:
This looks like what we refer to as a *ghost game*. This typically happens if the game server doesn't properly report the match results. In most cases, this resolves after a bit but doesn't take more than a few hours *at most*. 

Let me know if you're still seeing this issue.
